page.title: 03SPORTS PLAYED IN THE AREA
page.content: {CRICKET:}Undoubtedly the most popular sport in the area. There are four cricket grounds; village teams play at Langton Green and Fordcombe, whereas Holmewood House and Rusthall Sports Ground are used less regularly. {STOOLBALL:}A traditional Kent & Sussex game similar to cricket. It is played by a ladies team in Fordcombe. {SOCCER:}Soccer is played by village teams at Langton Green and Rusthall Sports Ground. {HOCKEY:}Hockey is played by Tunbridge Wells Hockey Club on the Holmewood House all-weather pitch. {ROCK CLIMBING:}One of the few places in the South East where rock climbing is available is High Rocks. Climbers pay 50p each to enter. {HORSE RIDING:}Riding is very popular in this area. There is a permanent point-to-point course at Tophill Farm.
